quest.name: An Unexpected Guide
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The hanuman langur is beckoning to you with uncertain intent.
objectives: Speak with the strange hanuman langur and follow behind it.

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Heee!

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Heeeheee!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It appears this creature wants you to follow it. What harm could come from doing so?

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Heeehooo!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The creature appears to want you to follow it deeper into the jungle.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Follow the hanuman langur and try not to fall behind.

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Hee! Heeehaaa!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The creature has guided you to this elderly Auri woman, but you have yet to discern why. However, it is plain that she requires aid.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You come upon an elderly Auri woman, bent over in pain and breathing haggardly. Provide what treatment to her that you can.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: Thank...thank you. I feel much better now.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: A terrible beast fell upon me, and I fled, quickly losing my bearings in the thick woods. This kindly creature guided me to safety, but my wounds pained me.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: How long ago was that? Bells ago? Days ago? I cannot say...

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Heee!

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: Of course, little friend. Thank you for delivering this kind soul to me. I owe you my life.

dialogue.name: HANUMAN04268
dialogue.text: <chitter> <chitter> Heee! Heeeheee!

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: We shouldn't stay here, for nowhere outside the village gates is safe. I believe I can return safely on my own. Seek me out, and I shall see you are rewarded for what you've done.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: Ah, my savior arrives at last! I feel right as rain now, and all thanks to your ministrations.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: And that creature, of course. I haven't seen it since returning here...

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: The legends of this island say the hanuman langurs are servants of the divinities, appearing when they deign to show an interest in worldly affairs. I think there may be some truth to those tales.

dialogue.name: WOMAN
dialogue.text: I must remember to make an offering when I am able. As for your reward, however, please take this, and know that I shall never forget the goodwill you showed me.
